subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Marian Hossa scored two short-handed goals, then connected in the shootout to help the Atlanta Thrashers end a season-high five-game losing streak Tuesday night with a 4-3 victory against the Devils.
snippet: Marian Hossa scored two short-handed goals, then connected in the shootout to help the Atlanta Thrashers end a season-high five-game losing streak Tuesday night with a 4-3 victory against the Devils.
